column1: non-turner outside off, full, Tamim inches forward, tips it to short cover and hares across for a risky single
flighted and holds its line on off stump, gently pushed to mid-off off the front foot
floated up outside off, the batsman is early into a drive, and scoops it wide of short cover
Soumya picks this full ball off the pads for a single. Tucked to deep square leg
good length and just a shade outside off, played back off the front foot
Tamim ventures down the track, but is beaten in flight as he inside-edges this non-turning offbreak towards the leg side
fuller than a good length and holds its line outside off, sucks Soumya into a drive and goes past the outside edge
Soumya rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and secures a single down to deep third man
pitched up and outside off, push-driven off the front foot to mid-off
overpitched and outside off, driven through the line. The man at short cover lets the ball burst through his hands. Mid-off, though, tracks the ball down

No Malinga? No problem. Pradeep can let rip inswinging yorkers. Plunges on Tamim and floors him. Given not out. Dimuth challenges the on-field not-out decision. There's a deflection and snicko confirms it. Inside-edged onto the boot, Tamim gets away. Sri Lanka lose a review, but what a ball from Pradeep
follows the yorker with a short ball on middle, Tamim camps back, gets right behind the line and defends
slider on middle, full, knocked away to mid-on's left
tossed outside off, Tamim dashes down the track and belts it straight of mid-on. Shot, Tamim
worked with the drift behind square on the leg side
straighter one just a shade outside off, defended back
nurdled through backward square leg for a double
really full and outside off, drilled straight to the man at extra-cover
back of a length and outside off, blocked
back of a length and zipping across off from over the stumps, left alone
clipped off the hips to long leg
tapped away, but can't find the gap on the off side
on a length and wide outside off, Soumya latches onto the width. Drives on the up and crunnnnnnnnnnches it between point and short-cover
shortish and outside off, glided away between point and short-cover once again
looped up and spins away a wee bit outside off, pressed to extra-cover off the front foot
another one that's lobbed up outside off, driven to short cover this time
slides on at off stump, jabbed back to de Silva
fuller and just a shade outside off, driven away, but can't find the off-side gap
off-stump yorker, dug out
worked with the angle behind the leg umpire for one

too full - overpitched - and just a shade outside off, right in the slot, Tamim clears his front leg and thrashes it in the air between the bowler and the non-striker. Pinged off the middle of the bat
on a length and around off, guided to point
glanced off the hips to the left of square leg

Soumya misses a full-toss has been given out lbw by umpire Hannibal. Wide of the crease, full-toss, slanting in from round the wicket, Soumya plays all around it and is pinned on the front pad in line with middle. This would have crashed into leg stump and Soumya has to exit. Soumya pondered over a review, but rightly decided against it in the end
back of a length and angling down the leg side for a wide
on a length and wobbling away outside off, Mithun covers his off stump and shoulders arms
full and angling into Mithun's front-foot defence on middle
good length, angling in, bouncing and seaming away just past the outside edge
shorter and angling into a leg-side flick to square leg
on a length and holds its line outside off, ignored
short and on a fifth-stump line, punched straight of mid-on
back of a length and nibbling away outside off, no shot
fullish and outside off, opens the face and dinks it to point
pitches outside leg and swerves in to catch the thigh pad as Tamim falls over the flick
fullish and outside off, tapped away between midwicket and mid-on
147ks inswinging yorker, jammed out by Tamim
on a length and on off, draws a leading edge to cover
whipped off the hips to long leg off the back foot
on a length and angling in just outside off, punched down to mid-on

Tamim has chopped on! Shortish and wide outside off - possibly wider than a set of stumps outside off - Tamim is drawn to the width like a magnet. He throws his hands at the ball with his feet nailed to the crease. He can only drag a thick inside edge back onto the stumps. Udana and Sri Lanka won't mind this one bit. One can't force shots on this sluggish track
pitched up and outside off, driven to the covers
diverted off the pads to square leg for one
back of a length and on top of off, blocked off the front foot
driven on the up to the left of mid-off for one
on a length and angling across off, driven through the line to extra-cover
back of a length on off, played back to Kumara
chest-high short ball on off, Mithun flaps a pull in the air, but does not carry to deep square leg
short and speared in at off, Mushfiqur gets right behind the line in defence
back of a length and darted in on middle, blocked back
banged in short and outside off, rushes Mithun for pace. The batsman nearly chops on
banged in short, aimed at the chest, 141ks, flapped behind to the keeper
pitched up and outside off, driven straight of mid-on. Avishka throws himself to his left like a goalkeeper and intercepts the ball
dragged short and outside off, Mushfiqur rides the bounce and pulls with great authority to deep midwicket
full and angling across off, no shot
shortish and outside off, tapped down to third man
pushed straight of mid-off for one
short and outside off, slapped away but only as far as point
short and outside off, flashed to deep third man
full and just a shade outside off, stabbed back to Kumara
rising short ball, Mithun rises with it, fending it behind square on the leg side
lifter outside off, Mushfiqur ducks under it
full outside off, forward and driven to short cover
bouncer, aimed at the head, he looks away, fends it in the air, and gets away
run down to third man with the angle
full and outside off, driven to mid-on
short, wide, slapped in the air over point
short, wide, Mithun slashes up and over point and pings the boundary
leading-edged but does not carry to point, looks like the offcutter from Udana
chest-high short ball on middle, which is swatted to long leg off the back foot
Kumara keeps hitting these splice-jarring lengths, short and outside off, 143ks, rushes the batsman into a hook. Flapped back to the bowler
short and outside off, helped down to deep third man
slower ball hung up outside off, ignored
banged in short on middle, fended off
lifter outside off, Mushfiqur sways away
dug into the middle of the deck, Mushfiqur ducks under once again
tossed outside off, driven to straight mid-on, where Mendis lets the ball through his hands
worked with the break to square leg. Mushfiqur reaches 6000 ODI runs

Welcome back, Akila Dananjaya! Dangled up outside off, full, breaks in, dips, creating distance between the bat and the pitch of the ball. Mithun can only pop it in the air to Kusal Mendis at straight midwicket
tossed up around middle, skips down the wicket and pushes it to midwicket with the turn
slightly shorter, flatter and outside off, holds its line as he goes back and taps it to the off side for one
length on middle, tucked away towards square leg
length outside off, happy to watch it through to the keeper
shorter and outside off, was threatening to follow the batsman but swerved away at the last moment, let through harmlessly
fuller on off, the sucker ball, but he comes forward confidently and defends
full again, straighter line around middle and off, holds its line and squares him up a little as he defends to the off side
length on the pads, tucked away towards deep backward square leg for one
length outside off, stays back, gets on his toes and defends towards point
length and spinning back in towards middle, goes back, opens up a little and defends
full on off, Mushfiqur comes across and pushes it through midwicket
full on off, pushed down the ground to long-on for one
quicker one on off, goes back and nudges it towards square leg but can't come across for one
full on middle, pushed to midwicket
full on off, defends to midwicket
fullish around off and Mushfiqur nearly spoons it back to the bowler, but to be fair it was reasonably far from him in his follow through
extra bounce beats him! Length outside off, Mushfiqur went for the backfoot cover drive misses
length, angled in, stifled appeal as Mahmudullah walks across and misses the ball but it hit him quite high and as the ball deflects off the pad to the leg side, they come across for two

another play and a miss as he slashes at a wide one but is beaten again by the extra bounce, perhaps could have done better to come across with his backfoot, which would have enabled him to get closer to the ball
length outside off, steered to third-man for what initially looked like one but a misfield allows them to come through for two
length on middle, tucked away towards square leg
tossed up around middle, Mushfiqur comes across his off stump, goes down on one knee and sweeps it fine for four
length outside off, flatter delivery, he waits for it and uses the pace to guide it towards short third-man
full on middle, pushed to midwicket
tossed up on middle, pushed to midwicket

Got him!! He went back looking for the cut due to the flatter trajectory and the line outside off, but it spun back sharply and took the top off much to Sri Lanka's elation. Bangladesh in trouble but this pitch is already playing tricks
length outside off, lunges forward to defend, it holds its line and beats his outside edge
full on off, comes forward and drills it hard, straight back to the bowler
full outside off, comes forward and defends to cover
full on middle and off, he plants his front foot forward and whips it away to mid-on's right, who can't get around to cut it off and it races away to the fence
pulls his length back ever so slightly, keeps the batsman rooted to the crease, but he manages to defend it to point
full outside off, Mushfiqur comes forward and across off stumps, before pushing it to long-on for one
leg spinner this time, but quite full, so he comes forward and defends
another leg break, almost a yorker, he digs it out
full on middle, defended

length outside off, Mushfiqur was shaping to cut, could have been dangerous, but he adjusted to the turn back in that cramped him a little, and defended it with soft hands towards the off side for one
length on middle, tucked away to deep square leg
length outside off, more width on offer on this occasion, rocks back and cuts to deep cover-point
length on middle, opens up a little and pushes it to midwicket
full outside off, he pushes forward and nearly chips it back to the bowler, who dives full length to his left but can't get a hand on it. Single to long-off to retain strike
full on middle, tucked away to deep midwicket for one
struck on the pad but turned down! It was another leg break, pretty full, went for the sweep and missed but it would have missed off with the spin
another leg break, flatter around middle, tucked away towards deep square leg
tossed up leg break on off, drilled back to the bowler
another leg break and he is losing his radar here, too full again and on leg stumps, helped along fine by Sabbir , as he taps it on its head to earn four
full on off, comes across to work it to the on side, gets an outside edge towards short third-man and they come through for a quick single
full outside off, width on offer, he tries to blast it through the off side but can't beat cover
flat outside off, there to be hit and he hits it hard but can't beat extra cover
full on off, comes forward and defends
length outside off, swatted to deep cover for one
full on middle and off, nudged away towards square leg for one
full on off, comes across and pushes it to midwicket
dropped! Full on off, tossed up, Mushfiqur made a bit of room and hammered it straight back at the bowler, it came at a good height but burst through his fingers

What's happened there? Looks like we have a run out, yes he's short of his ground, just short, but should really have been run out by a mile. Pushed towards point and he takes off with the shot for a non existent run, Mushfiqur says no but it's too late, except the fielder from slip who hared across to pick the ball up sends the throw back in blind, on the turn and the keeper does superbly to first collect it and then drag it back on to the stumps just in the nick of time
length outside off, steered to third-man
short around middle, looks to pull but it hurries on to him and trickles away towards midwicket without any power
another short one, he is in two minds whether to leave or ramp it over the keeper, beaten outside off, as a result
length outside off, nips back in off the seam ever so slightly and cuts him in half as he goes for the booming cover drive from the crease
length on off, stays back, gets on his toes and defends to point
full on off, defended
length outside off, sharp turn back in again but he does well to wait for it and guide it to slip's right for one
full on off, comes forward and defends, great line, though, testing both edges
goes for the leg break and loses his radar again, full toss on middle, pushed to long-on
attempted googly, slips down the leg side
goes back to the off break, length around off, he goes back and nudges it towards square leg for one
length outside off, guides it to third-man for one
length outside off, climbing on to him at pace, gets on his toes and steers it past point for one
slower ball, misdirected, and called wide as Mushfiqur decides to let it through
pushed to mid-off, they scamper across for one, the throw misses the non striker's end and hits the stumps at the striker's end and the ricochet allows and extra overthrow
length on off, pushed back to the bowler, who hurls it back to the keeper
short one on middle and leg and Mushfiqur has ample time to duck under it
slower ball outside off, floated up, Mushfiqur goes at it with his hands and gets an outside edge past point for one
fired in on leg and called wide as Mushfiqur lets it through
length on middle, tucked away towards midwicket
full and flat on off, comes forward and defends
leg break this time, too full, as it has normally been, comes forward and defends
another leg break, better length this time, comes forward but not close enough to the ball due to the length, gets an outside edge past slip for one
length on middle, tucked away past midwicket's right for one
googly this time, comes forward and defends back to the bowler
full outiside off, overpitched, he leans nicely into it and caresses it to deep cover's right for two
slower ball outside off, watches it through to the keeper
length around off, squares him up as he comes forward but no hard down as it is squirted away to third-man for one
length outside off, slower ball but too wide and Mushfiqur watches it through to the keeper
beaten! Stifled appeal turned down but it was more for the delivery rather than an outside edge, angled across and beat his outside edge with some extra bounce as he came forward to defend
length on off, defended to point, followed by a loud shout of no
full on middle, tucked away towards square leg for one
full on off, comes forward and across before tickling it towards short fine-leg
short and wide and flat, looks to use the pace but can't beat short third-man
fired in on middle, seeing as he has been keen to come across, but Mosaddek manages to get plenty of bat on it as he works it through midwicket
length outside off, steered towards point for one
full on middle, pushed to long-on
length outside off, bit of extra bounce as he defends to the off side, slightly squared up
short and angled in, walks across and helps it along to fine-leg's right for a couple
yorker outside off, squeezed past point for one
length outside off, steered to third-man for one

another short one and he tries to help it along past the keeper as he had couple of balls ago but this one bounced a little extra, was also the slower ball, which meant he was though the stroke too early, just kissed the edge of the bat through to the keeper and Bangladesh are really staring down the barrel now
pitched up and outside off, Mehidy stretches out, drives and finds the man at cover
pushed through on middle from round the wicket, knocked to short midwicket
back of a length and angling across off, cramps Mushfiqur for room, chopped to point
flighted and breaks in towards off, worked to short midwicket
nudged with the break once again, this time between short midwicket and square leg
jabbed in front of square on the off side for one
pushed through outside off, played back off the front foot

Kusal Perera dives full length to his right, but the ball eludes his outstretched right hand and rolls down to the third-man boundary. On a length and nibbling away outside off, Mushfiqur prods at it, the ball kisses the edge, but it's away from Kusal's reach
back of a length and outside off, stabbed to sweeper cover
pitched up and angling across off, driven on the up to mid-off
banged in short at the body, pulled on the bounce to long leg
hip-high short ball on middle, which is swatted away to deep midwicket
short once again, pulled away, cleaned up by long leg
full on the stumps, dabbed to short midwicket
shorter and slides on outside off, chopped off the back foot to backward point
worked with the break to the right of short midwicket off the front foot
tossed up on middle, Mushfiqur jumps across off and scoops it fine of short fine leg
flatter and on off, jabbed to mid-on. Mix-up between the wickets, Mehidy undoes his steps and pulls out the dive to save himself
flatter and speared outside off, some extra bounce carries the ball over the batsman's attempted cut
fullish and around off, dinked down to third man
short and on off, forced off the back foot tom mid-on. They take on Akila's arm for the single
full and homing in on middle, clipped away past the right of short midwicket
short and slanting in at the body, rolls his wrists and pulls to deep square
leg-stump full-toss, flicked to deep square
mighty full and outside off, stabbed to the right of mid-on for a quick single
tossed up and spins in, played back to the bowler
mid-off is up in the circle, and Mehidy nips down the track and launches it over that fielder
wider outside off, driven with an open face to sweeper cover
flatter and sliding across off, cut away past point off the back foot and that's fifty for Mushfiqur
full and skidding in, worked behind square leg
on the hips, tucked to long leg off the back foot
good length on off, possibly a slower ball, Mushfiqur delays his cut to third man
Mehidy shuffles across off and clips a single to deep square
shovelled away to deep midwicket with the bottom wrist
slower cutter outside off, Mehidy wafts and nearly chops on
hip-high short ball on off stump, Mehidy swivels on the back foot and strongly pulls it between long leg and deep midwicket
full and angling into off, knocked to short midwicket. Mehidy searches for a risky single, but is rightly sent back by his senior partner
full and angling into a leg-side flick to short midwicket
flighted and spins in at off, worked away with the break to the right of short midwicket
Mehidy jumps across off and nurdles a single to square leg
Mushfiqur searches for turn, this slides on with the arm, grazes the outside edge and rolls to short third man
much fuller and straighter, tickled to short fine leg
legbreak, ends up too straight, whipped past midwicket's right
another legbreak, much slower through the air on off, played back to Akila to close out the over
he hits a hard length right away, whipped from middle stump to deep midwicket
off-stump yorker, squeezed to mid-off
chest-high short ball on middle, 142ks, Mehidy is late onto the pull. Tickles it away fine past the left of the diving keeper
back of a length and angling in, Mehidy shuffles across off and clips to short midwicket
full-toss, angling down the leg side, away from the reach of Mehidy's flick, as well Kusal's gloves
short, outside off, forced to the covers off the back foot
Mushfiqur ramps a short ball outside off to deep third man
on a length and slides on outside off, steered to point off the back foot
tossed on middle, run away to the cover-point region for one
dangled up on off, stabbed back to the bowler
flatter and fired outside off, legbreak, Mehidy picks it off the pitch and glides it past Dimuth at short third man. The captain dives to his right, makes a mess of it, and gives up a boundary
looks like a wrong'un, much fuller, Mehidy can't pick this variation and wears it on the pad. Think he might have been hit outside the line. The lbw appeal is turned down
another wrong'un, full, dead-batted away by Mehidy
short and attached with width outside off, Mushfiqur leans back and middles the cut. A+ for placement as well. Got it behind point and to the right of deep third man
full and arrowed in at off, tip and run to cover for one
full and outside off, driven back off the front foot
lifter outside off, too high and flies through to the keeper. Kumara has to re-bowl this
whipped off the pads to fine leg
Mushfiqur rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and helps it down to deep third man
pitched up and outside off, drilled straight to the covers
tossed on middle, flicked away to deep square
paddled to short fine leg for a scampered single
Mushfiq eyes up a reverse-sweep, but this was held back by Akila, rapped on the thigh pad
down the track and stabbed back to Akila's right
full on leg stump, Mushfiqur sweeps flat and hard to deep square leg
drifting down the leg side, left alone, wide
tossed outside off, laced down to long-on
very full on off, a whirl of the wrists sends the ball to the left of deep midwicket and right of wide long-on for four. Whippage from Mehidy Hasan Miraz
short and tilted at off stump, defended back to Kumara
on a length and angling in at off stump, whisked to mid-on
back of a length and zipping through the channel, Mehidy feels for the ball...and misses it
on a length and outside off, forward and steered to point
back of a length and outside off, jabbed to point. Kumara ends with 0 for 42 in his 10 overs
slower ball, shortish and outside off, sits up, smeared away to sweeper cover's left
full-toss outside off, eased off the front foot to sweeper cover again
full-toss on middle, forced to mid-off inside the circle
another slower ball, short, wide, scythed to sweeper once again
short and outside off, gets on top of it and punches to point
Udana searches for the yorker, comes out as a full-toss. With mid-off in the circle, Mehidy hoists it over him
full on leg stump, swept away fine past the keeper
slower ball, short and outside off, down the track and bottom-edges a cut to deep third man
Spliced into the lap of mid-off. Slower variation from Pradeep, legcutter from the back of the hand, Mehidy has a big slog at it, but gets it high on the bat and pops a catch to Dimuth
inswinging yorker on off stump, dug back to Pradeep. Malinga will be proud of this
full-toss on off, slapped down to mid-off
full-toss on off, sliced only as far as mid-off
short, wide, slower ball, cracked to point off the back foot
full-toss on off, shovelled away with the bottom wrist to wide long-on for a double
very full and outside off, Mushfiqur can't connect with a reverse-paddle

full on middle, shuffles across and hacks it away to deep square leg. Mushfiqur tears back for the second, dishes out a dive, Kusal makes life easier for him by not gathering the throw cleanly. He broke the bails without collecting the ball
slower dipper outside off, 103ks, stabbed to the covers. Dimuth misses a direct hit this time. Mushfiq slides his bat underneath Udana's boot and gets away. Two run-out chances misses in two balls
slower ball outside off, guided to cover
slower short ball on middle, splices a pull to deep midwicket. Mushfiqur declines the single on offer
another slower short ball on middle, slugged away between deep midwicket and wide long-on, this time Mushfiqur jogs across for the single and passes the strike to Islam
full-toss angling across off, stabbed to the covers for one to bring Mushfiqur back on strike
shortish legcutter, moves away outside off, Mushfiqur hauls it away straight of mid-on. Flat-batted away, tennis-style
seam-up, short on the body, pulled to fine leg on the bounce
full-toss outside off, carved away to sweeper cover. Mushfiqur accepts the single on offer
bouncer outside off, Taijul aims a pull, but can't touch it
short, wide outside off, Taijul reaches out for the ball and slaps a single to sweeper cover
short and outside off, slower ball, Mushfiqur delays his loft and slices it up and over extra-cover. Excellent stroke from Mushfiqur
slower legcutter outside off, third man is up in the circle, Mushfiqur spots it and reverse-scoops it fine of him

Udana loses his length and his head. Full-toss on middle, Mushfiqur sizes it up and launches it like a bazooka over the longest boundary. Powered over midwicket. Okay, the two umpires converge and deliberate whether this is a beamer. Is is above the waist? Nope, doesn't look like it, not given a no-ball
on a length and outside off, tapped to covers
Dropped by Kusal. On a length and outside off, Mushfiqur jumps across off and scoops it in the air. Kusal leaps, but can't cling onto this one-hander. Such a tough chance

lifter outside off from around the wicket, Taijul wants to slug it over midwicket, but does not touch it. Mushfiqur hares across for the bye, but Taijul is ball-watching and is late to respond. Kusal gathers the ball and passes it to Pradeep, who nails the stumps with an overarm throw to catch Taijul short by an inch or two. Mushfiqur is seething and gives the departing Taijul and earful
legcutter outside off, stabbed to the left of cover for one

Kusal Perera takes one glove off even before Pradeep loads up. But he can't capitalise on a run-out chance, SL end up conceding overthrows. Mustafizur slogs to the leg side and misses. Kusal throws it to Pradeep, who has a shy at the stumps at his end, but it's well away from the reach
short on the hips, pulled away to deep square leg, on the bounce, just a single
on a length and outside off, slog-swept wildly over midwicket for a double
full on off, defended
full on the pads, bit of turn on offer but he uses it to deflect it fine for three
full outside off, overpitched and he just leans into it, without trying to hit it too hard and caresses it through the covers
full on off, driven to mid-off
length outside off, driven to extra cover and they scamper a single
length outside off, left alone
length outside off, nice tight line, hint of shape back in but left alone safely
length on the pads this time, tucked away to fine leg's right for a comfortable two
length around off, nips back in slightly as Dimuth looks to defends and gets a thick inside edge towards square leg
length on off, excellent line again, Dimuth tries to manufacture something but is cramped up in his attempt to dab it fine
length on off, defended
full on middle, pushed to midwicket
length on middle, he comes down the wicket and pushes it down the ground to long-on for one
full on middle, he makes room and pushes it to mid-off
flatter outside off, rocks back to cut but it doesn't quite come on and turns away a little
full on off, defended
length, angled in, tries to push it to the off side but it holds in the surface again - and remember this is a brand new ball - gets a thick inside edge towards square leg
full outside off, almost a yorker, hint of swing away, squeezed out to the off side
length on off, shaping back in nicely as Dimuth stays rooted to the crease and is nearly done in by the lack of bounce, just gets his bat down in time
optimistic appeal turned down, good ball, however. He skipped down the wicket to cover the inward movement, was outside the line when it hit him and there was also an inside edge before that
length outside off, Dimuth watches it through to the keeper
length outside off, pushed to mid-on's left off a thick inside edge and they scamper a single
quicker, flatter and angled in, Dimuth stays back and is struck on the pad
tossed up on middle, he clears his front leg and pushes it towards mid-off for a run
length on middle, opens up to negotiate the turn back in, pushes it towards square leg
length outside off, but there's a bit of width, furthermore, it slid nicely on and he just used the pace to guide it between point and short third-man
full on off, defended
tossed up on off, drawing Dimuth forward, induces a thick outside edge as he fails to reach the pitch but trickles away along the ground to short third-man
length and angled in on middle, presents a straight bat and defends back to the bowler
slower ball, full and angling in, slides down the leg side
length outside off, gets on his toes and punches it off the backfoot, finds the gap through extra cover for a glorious boundary
length outside off and he pounces on the little width offered, on the up and through cover point this time, class written all over it, great shot!
short and angled in this time and he just transfers his weight and picks it up with the angle, over square leg for the third consecutive boundary. Shades of Aravinda de Silva
length, angled, in, slower ball this time, can' get any bat on it but the deflection off the pad earns a single
length on the pads, tucked away to deep square leg for two
length and angled in, pushed to cover
full and angled in, turned around towards square leg for one
flat and fast, angled across, Dimuth hangs back and pushes it down the ground
length outside off and Fernando is on a roll here, rocks back, makes a little room and pierces the cover field with another glorious punch
full and angled in, defended to mid-on
length, angled in as he sees him make room, manages to push it to long-off anyway
length and misdirected down the leg side, Fernando can't get any bat on the freebie from Mustafizur but it's a wide
length on the pads, gets on his toes and punches it towards midwicket this time, two the result
length outside off, another backfoot punch, but straight to cover-point this time
short one, angled across but Fernando is so quick to pick up the length, goes over wide mid-on this time, one bounce and into the fence

full and nearly through him, his first false stroke but he won't mind, it's another boundary, this time off the inside edge, narrowly missing the stumps on the way as he attempted another drive on the up with the ball not there for the shot
length on off, tries to blast it through the covers again but there's no timing
length on middle, slower ball, squaring him up slightly as he defends to the off side
length on the pads, struck on the thigh
squared him and there's a massive appeal but seems optimistic! Great ball, angled in and turns sharply away to strike him on the pads but too high and probably pitched outside leg
Fernando hits back! Full and angled in, uses his feet and lofts him inside out, over the cover field for four
full on the pads, can't beat short fine leg
sweeps again, only pad this time, they come through for one this time
getting carries away there, length, angled in and straightens after pitching, he threw the proverbial kitchen sink at that but missed it completely
short and dismissed! Picks up the length so, so early and hammers a pull in front of square and it sails all the way
full on middle, defended back but there's no respite for Mustafizur as it's a no-ball and he has only himself to blame
he's running away from the batsman here, that was wide enough to have gone to second slip, he watches it through
full and wide outside off, gets it perfectly right this time, squeezed away towards point
slower ball, full outside off, squirted away to third man's right for a couple
short one, angled across, he pulls out of the stroke after initially shaping to go for it and it's called wide for height
length on middle, comes forward and runs it to backward point with an angled bat
slower ball, angled across, steered down to third-man, and finally, that's the end of the over, another good one for Sri Lanka
full on off, pushed to cover
length, angled in, holds up a little, pushed back to the bowler
slower, tossed up on off, inviting him forward, induces an outside edge to short third-man
snorter! Slightly shorter and snakes away sharply after pitching on middle. Turn and bounce
more of it, draws him forward again and gets not only to spin away but also bounce, taking the splice to short third-man
length on off, comes forward and defends to survive what was the best over of the innings for Bangladesh
full and fired in, Dimuth tries to work it around, only gets it down to short fine leg off the pad for one
length outside off, turns back in but he waits for it and pushes it towards point with soft hands for one

through him and Mehidy roars! Dimuth has a tendency to clear his front leg to play through the off side, this one was cleverly pushed through, and caught Dimuth rooted to the crease, resulting in a deflection off the flap of the pad back on to the stumps as the ball skid on to him after pitching
full on off, pushed to mid-off and they scamper one
full on middle, uses his wrists and reach to push it to long-on
more turn and bounce as Mehidy delivers this perfectly on a length, Kusal Perera nearly hangs his bat out but pulls it back in to defend it to point at the last moment
length, angled in, pushed to long-on to bring up his second ODI fifty and an excellent one at that
length outside off, bit of width, Perera cuts hard but finds the deep fielder
full on middle, pushed back to the bowler
tossed up on off, drilled back to the bowler this time
full and angled in, pushed down the ground to long-on for one
full outside off, controls the drive through the off side, this time the fielder at deep cover has work to do to his left as they come through for a comfortable couple
slower on middle, he walks across slightly and has to play around his front pad, tickles it down to fine leg for three
full and angled in, comes down the wicket and pushes it to midwicket
tossd up again, he goes for the conventional sweep this time, goes very hard at it and gets a thick inside edge towards deep midwicket
on the pads and out of the park! Length ball from around the wicket, no danger of lbw, he goes down on one knee and slog sweeps it between deep midwicket and deep square leg, but also over them
fuller on the pads, tucked away towards square leg for one
full outside off, pushed to cover
slower on a length outside off, goes back and pushes it to point
fuller and angled in, comes forward and defends
quicker and fuller, angled in, comes down the track and drills it to long-on
length, angled in, tries to tuck it away to the on side but misses and is struck on the thigh
pushed through, flat and full, he stays back when he should have come forward and nearly done in there like his captain
full on middle, pushed to long-off
ugly heave to the leg side as he skips down the wicket but gets an inside edge towards squareleg
full and angled in, comes forward and nudges it to square leg
full on middle, comes forward and turns it around to deep midwicket for one
full on middle, tickled to short fine-leg
length on middle, goes back and nudges it to deep square leg for one
full outside off and out comes the reverse sweep, it was fired in and he just uses the pace, gets it away pretty fine for four
full on middle, pushed to deep cover
length and on the pads, easy picking for Fernando, who sweeps it hard down to deep backward square leg
full on middle, tucked away towards square leg
slid down the leg side for a wide. Get your lines right, Bangladesh
spinning down the leg side once again. Taijul can't control the turn
turning in from over the stumps, diverted off the pads to the leg side
mighty full on off, Avishra races down the track and belts it down to long-off
short and breaks back in, off the pad and rolls to the leg side
tossed on middle, blocked
floated up outside off, driven through the line down to long-off
full on the stumps, whipped away through midwicket
off-stump yorker, jammed down to mid-off
back of a length and outside off, cutter from the Fizz, Avishka does not get hold of the pull. Spliced over mid-on running back
rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and guides it to third man
full on the stumps, punched to mid-off
pitches outside leg and curves in to catch the thigh pad. The lbw appeal is shot down

The man at the midwicket boundary runs in and misjudges it. Mosaddek is the culprit. Kusal muscles it away over the top of Mosaddek. He was already a few yards in, should've been at the edge of the boundary to snaffle it
scoops a leading edge to cover
slides on with the arm, forced to sweeper cover off the back foot
looped up on middle, Kusal uses his feet and chips the ball in front of midwicket
full and just outside off, chopped to short third man

Mosaddek tears in from sweeper cover, and drops it. Avishka gets a life. Flighted and breaks away outside off, Avishka aimed to lift it over mid-off, but the ball turns more than he expected it to. Catches the outside edge. Sliced in the air, and Mosaddek can't cling onto another sharp chance in the same over
short of a length on middle, played back to the bowler
overpitched on off stump, driven hard to mid-off
picked up and dispatched over mid-on. A bit too full on middle and leg, another cutter from Mustafizur, Avishka launches it with a twirl of the wrists

Another cutter from Mustafizur, this one nabs Avishka. He rolls his fingers across this short ball outside off. It kicks up at Avishka, who is early into the pull as well. He winds up splicing a catch to Tamim running to his right from mid-on. Played, Avishka. It was good fun
full-toss outside off, driven smoothly but straight to Mosaddek at extra-cover
another cutter from Mustafizur, deftly glided between the keeper and wider slip. Third man fumbles in the deep and gives up a boundary
down the track, beaten in flight, chipped in the air to the right of short midwicket

on a length and skids back in, Kusal goes for a sweep and might have snicked it onto the pad. The lbw appeal is turned down, and Bangladesh decide against a review. Off the elbow, and not the bat, according to the replays. And the tracker returns umpire's call on middle stump
turn and bounce, diverted to short fine leg
fuller and breaks in, Kusal deflects it away to the leg side
tickled in front of short midwicket as Taijul finds more turn and bounce
full on off, nudged square of short fine leg for one
just short of a length and outside off, sweetly punched to the off-side sweeper
full and slanting in towards off stump, Mendis presses forward and blocks back to Mustafizur
full and angling into a leg-side flick to square leg
pitched up and just a shade outside off, defended back once again
back of a length on middle, defended stoutly
slower cutter, short and fizzes away outside off, Mendis is too early into a pull and is beaten
shorter and breaks away outside off, Kusal top-edges a cut. Skied in the air between short third man and backward point
uses his feet and squeezes a single to point
tossed up and spins in towards middle, clipped with the break to deep square leg
flighted on off, tip and run to the off side. Top running from the two Kusals
sharp turn for Mehidy, tickled to short fine leg
tossed on off, driven to the right of mid-on
back of a length and outside off, angled down to deep third man for one
Kusal goes for an almighty heave-ho, but has to settle with a thick inside edge onto the pad
back of a length and outside off, Mustafizur hits the deck, spliced to point
full and outside off, Kusal drills it on the up... straight to short cover. Driven into the lap of Soumya Sarkar, and that's another opening for Bangladesh
back of a length and angling across off, patted to cover
pitched up and outside off, driven through the line to mid-off
on a length and drifts in on middle,blocked to the leg side off the back foot
pushed through on middle, played back to Islam
drifts in at off and turns, prodded to point
floated up on middle, Mendis ventures forward and across to smother it
full and spins away outside off, eased to sweeper cover
that's a beaut from Taijul Islam. Perfectly-pitched ball, drifts in towards off, Mathews is tricked into playing for the drift and angle, but it spins away so very late to go past the outside edge
shorter and angling away outside off, run away towards point
full on middle, played back to the bowler
cutter, moves away outside off, dinked down to deep third man
back of a length and slanting away outside off, Mathews stands up tall and punches the ball to cover
yorker outside off, stabbed out to the covers
cutter on a length and nips away outside off, Mathews reads it and deftly dabs to point
tossed up on middle, dead-batted away off the front foot
looped up and breaks away outside off, carved to point off the front foot
drift and sharp turn outside off, Mendis reaches out for the ball and is beaten lavishly
once again, full, angling in at off from wide of the crease and spins biggggg to beat the outside edge and off stump
pushed through fuller on off, defended off the front foot
fuller and outside off, run away with soft hands to the right of second slip. SL see off Taijul
shortish and outside off, punched to mid-off
back of a length and outside off, punched again, this time to sweeper cover
lifter outside off, too high, wide called by umpire Erasmus
full and angling in on middle, knocked defensively to short midwicket
dug in short and outside off, hauled away to short midwicket
short and angling across off, slapped on the bounce to backward point
full and attacking the pads as the batsman falls over the flick, but seems to have snicked it. Tamim and Islam have their hands on their heads. The deflection seems to have saved Mendis
dragged down outside off, crashed away to sweeper cover off the back foot
half-tracker on off stump, slugged away to the midwicket boundary. That's the release for SL
short and spins away outside off, forced to sweeper cover off the back foot
much fuller and outside off, hit to sweeper cover once again
straighter one, Mathews covers up in defence
dragged down outside off, cracked off the back foot, but the man at short cover - Mehidy - throws himself to his left to gather the ball cleanly
back of a length on middle stump, Mathews handsomely punches between mid-on and midwicket
shortish and outside off, flayed to sweeper cover off the back foot
good length and on the stumps, defended
chest-high short ball on middle, Mathews jumps on the back foot and middles a pull behind square on the leg side. Rolls his wrists and hits it with great authority
pitched up and outside off, pushed back to the bowler
full on the stumps, driven to the left of short midwicket
full and spins in on middle, whisked away to short midwicket
dragged down on middle, slog-swept flat and hard to deep square
full and spinning down the leg side, sharp turn and runs away past the left of the keeper for 5 wides
flighted and outside off, driven with the turn to the left of short midwicket, down to long-on
floated up outside off, driven off an inside edge to short midwicket
darted on off stump, swatted off the back foot to long-on
mighty full and outside off, Mathews gets forward and drives down to long-on
full on middle, pushed to mid-wicket with soft hands and they scamper one
length outside off, punched to cover
full on the pads, tucked away to fine leg for one
full and straight, pushed down the ground to long-on for one
full on the pads, tailing in slightly but he leans in on it, importantly keeping the bat face straight and times it superbly through midwicket for four
length outside off, steered to third-man to retain strike
full outside off, comes forward and defends to midwicket
full on off, goes for the sweep, gets it away fine for one
length on off, sharp turn back in, keeps slightly low as well, but Mathews adjusts well and tucks it away through square leg for one
length outside off, slower and turns back in slightly, he waits for it and steers it to short third-man
length on middle, whipped away to deep midwicket for one
length outside off, shuffles across and defends
length on middle, pushed to midwicket
full on the pads, watched closely by Mendis as he tucks it away to deep square leg
full on middle, pushed past midwicket's left which means long-on has to move an appreciable distance to his right to cut it off, which allows two
slower ball outside off, grips off the surface as Mathews defends it tentatively and takes it on the flap of the pad, leading to mild excitement among the Bangladesh players
full and on the pads and he loves it there, flicks nicely past short midwicket, the timing's excellent and the result, a foregone conclusion from the moment ball made contact with bat
full outside off, comes forward and defends
full outside off, takes a couple of steps down the pitch and pushes it to long-on
length on the pads, tucked away to deep square leg
length on middle and off, pushed between square leg and midwicket for one
length outside off, he wanted to late cut it, was beaten by the turn as the ball exploded off the pitch and went through bat and pad, but unfortunately for Bangladesh also through the keeper
length outside off, waits for it and pats it to the off side
length on middle and off, tucked away to square leg for one
length outside off, looks for the late cut but extra bounce and hint of turn prevent him
short on off, pushed to midwicket for one
length outside off, defended back
quicker one outside off, pushed into the vacant cover region for one
length, on the pads, poor ball and dealt with, just nudged down to fine-leg for another boundary
slower ball, straighter line, pushed to midwicket
full on the pads this time, clipped to deep square leg for one
short one on middle, he shapes for the pull, goes down low with the ball as it doesn't quite rise, helps it along to deep square leg
full on middle, Mathews turns the bat face too soon, gets a bit of a leading edge towards point
full outside off, overpitched and Mathews drills it through extra cover with his back knee fully bent
length on middle, tickled to short fine leg
nearly chips it to midwicket as he tries to help it along to the leg side
length outside off, steered towards point for one
full outside off, pushed to cover
beauty! flat and full, Mathews comes forward and plays for the turn, is beaten outside off
fuller and straighter, pushed to midwicket
full outside off, he looks to sweep and gets it away off a thick inside edge to deep square leg
full and fired in on off, pushed to long-on for one
tossed up outside off, hint of turn as Mendis gets a thick inside edge to short fine
full on middle, pushed to midwicket
length on middle, goes right back and turns it around to deep square leg for one
full on off, comes forward and pushes it to midwicket
length outside off, tucked away to square leg for one
full and fired in on the stumps, Mendis goes for the sweep again, manages to get enough bat for a single to deep square leg
fired in on the pads, it was quite full and easy pickings for Mathews, who scoops it over short fine leg for four
length on middle, pushed to midwicket
full on middle, pushed towards deep midwicket for one
length on off, shuffles and defends
seemingly struck in front but turned down! Fired in on the stumps as Mathews shuffled and missed the straight one but Bangladesh were too late to decide to take a review
full on the pads, tickled fine
quicker one outside off, goes back and defends
length outside off, turn back in as he looks to cut, gets one to point
length on middle, turned towards midwicket
short outside off, cut away to deep cover
full on middle, pushed to long-on
Mathews looks to go big, gets an outside edge that spoons up towards short third-man but falls short
just manages to clear mid-on! Full toss on middle, was dipping, he got it off the bottom of the bat but had enough elevation to clear mid-on
pushed through on middle, he goes back and tucks it away to deep square leg
full on middle, pushed to midwicket
length outside off, pushed to deep cover-point for one
full on middle, pushed to midwicket
full on off, comes forward and defends
full on the pads, pushed to midwicket
full on off, pushed back to the bowler
short on middle, Mathews pulls it away to the deep midwicket fence
length on off, pushed to mid-off
full on middle, lofts it over mid-on, gets to fifty, a very composed fifty, and helps Sri Lanka seal the series, their maiden ODI series win at home in 44 months
